pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()Mimi-cry, the parasite, crawls along a blade of its own formation. Despite the fleshy feeling, the weapon's hardened tissue still impacts heavily on contact, cutting, piercing or bludgeoning depending on whichever form it takes. It was created by a far advanced society

as an experiment to replicate an army of strong and expendable creatures. This test subject however, was able to escape, taking the form of a weapon and using this disguise to flee from the captors who now wish to exterminate it. In the short time it has been here, it has killed many, and now looks for a home, free of conflict, in your hands.
